DEMO_322_MSG_010: ̂Because this message has been activated, that must mean that you've reached the Grim Tundra.
DEMO_322_MSG_020:
̂That must mean that you've succesfully protected Lucia's research as well...
ā
DEMO_322_MSG_030:
̂Which, in turn... means that our seed must be safely growing as well...
ā
DEMO_322_MSG_040: ̂Lucia thought about more than just our fighting capabilites... she wanted to enrich the world, and make it a better place.
DEMO_322_MSG_050:
̂And though this seed created "hope", we had a "hope" of our own. And that hope, is you... ȁ.
ā
DEMO_322_MSG_060:
̂I believe it is time... allow me to show you yet
another one of your lost memories...
